Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Studios, Apartments and detached Houses with Kitchenette, Telephone, Ceiling fan, Safe and Balcony. *The Alkyon comprises 4 other buildings besides the reception. The different buildings are called Kirki, Kalypso, Aiolos and Apollon.
Important place or monument close to the hotel: Sea -90m, Lygia -700m, Lefkas town -6km, Nidri -10km. Nearest airport: Preveza airport -26km.
